titleStmt.title: A New engagement, or, Manifesto wherein is declared the sence and resolution of many thousands of well-affected people in and about London, and some adjacent counties (viz. Kent, Hartford, Buckingham, and Berks, &c.)

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.

Appears on t.p.: Published at the desire of some honest and eminent persons, for the satisfaction of all that seek not the advancement of parties and factions, but desire the peace and prosperitie of the nation.
